recipe.title: Cucumber-Basil Egg Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup sliced green onions (green part only)
3 tablespoons lightly packed chopped fresh basil
instructions: Gently combine the eggs, cucumbers, shallots, green onions, and basil in a medium bowl. Stir in the mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
Store in the refrigerator for up to three days.
